channel.title: Virus in my character files!
channel.description: There is a file called dont try in my character file and there has been people hacking peoples accounts on my server and i can't seem to delete the hacker files it says something like the source disk cant be found wtf how do i delete it!?

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
:menu
title 1234’s All-in-one V1.4
echo Hello and thank you for using 1234’s All-in-1 V1.4 that was made from scratch
echo Choose your option below :
echo.
echo Q - To delete your class files *WARNING
echo G - To see the credits
echo Z - To convert the server to Jar archive
echo L - To compile your server
echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat )
echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg )
echo R - To run your server
echo E - To exit this file
echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction )
echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg )
echo D - To delete all character files
echo P - To start the command maker
echo.
set /p c=Option ?
if %c%==Q goto 1
if %c%==q goto 1
if %c%==P goto 2
if %c%==p goto 2
if %c%==G goto 8
if %c%==g goto 8
if %c%==Z goto jar
if %c%==z goto jar
if %c%==L goto c
if %c%==l goto c
if %c%==D goto del
if %c%==d goto del
if %c%==S goto rock
if %c%==s goto rock
if %c%==C goto shops2
if %c%==c goto shops2
if %c%==R goto runserver
if %c%==r goto runserver
if %c%==E goto exit
if %c%==e goto exit
if %c%==J goto java
if %c%==j goto java
if %c%==a goto file
if %c%==A goto file
pause
cls
:1
cls
title Confirmation
echo Are you sure you want to delete your class files?This may never
echo let you run your server again. (yes/no)
echo.
set /p c=Y or N?
if %c%==y goto 6
if %c%==Y goto 6
if %c%==n goto menu
if %c%==N goto menu
:6
cls
title Delete class files
echo Class files are deleting…
echo.
if exist *.class (del *.class)
echo Process done.
pause
cls
goto menu
:2
cls
title Command Maker
echo Please note that this command maker will
echo make a folder in your server file called
echo ‘commands’.Inside the folder
echo will be your commands.You can manually
echo add the commands by copying and pasting them
echo into your client.java.
echo Thank you.
echo.
echo.
Set /p CmdName=Command Name?
Set /p RUSure=Are You Sure To Give It the Name %CmdName%(y,n)?
If %RUSure%==n GOTO Start
If not Exist Commands MD Commands
Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo { >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
set /p AY=addItem(y,n)?
If %AY%==Y Goto addItem
If %AY%==y Goto addItem
If %AY%==n Goto endCode
If %AY%==Y Goto endCode
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode

:endCode
cls
Echo } >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /p Again=Make Another?
If %Again%==y GOTO Start
If %Again%==n Exit
If %Again%==Y GOTO Start
If %Again%==N Exit
:Tele
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Another Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
:8
cls
title Credits
echo Hello and thank you for using this batch file
echo based program.
echo.
echo Here are the real credits :
echo Frell ( Batch IDE, helped me a bit )
echo 1234ideclareathumbwar ( Me =D )
echo Legend Rene ( I don’t know why? *Actually he
echo kept me company while making it. )
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
cls
:jar
cls
title Jar convert
echo This will now convert your class files into an
echo executable Jar archive.
echo.
jar cf Server.jar .class
echo.
echo Process done.
echo.
pause
cls
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
%javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/.java
echo.
echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok’s compiler
echo It can be found in other server folders.
echo.
pause
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist “%pro%_04%jac%” (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist “%pro%_05%jac%” (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac="%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cl
cls
goto c5
:je
echo You don’t have Java installed on this computer
echo Get it at java.sun.com
pause
cls
:del
cls
del /F /S /Q characters
del /F /S /Q connectedfrom
del /F /S /Q moreinfo
del /F /S /Q savedgames
echo All characters have been deleted
echo successfully.
pause
cls
goto menu
:rock
cls
echo. >>“run.bat”
echo Run.bat has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
:shops2
cls
echo. >>“shops2.cfg”
echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>“shops2.cfg”
echo The file has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
:runserver
cls
title Runserver
echo Loading server…
echo.
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
cls
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
:file
cls
echo. >>“autospawn2.cfg”
echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>“autospawn2.cfg”
echo The file has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
pause
cls
goto menu
:java
cls
echo client.java is loading…
java -cp .client
cls
goto menu
pause
cls
:exit
cls
title exit
echo Thank you for at least using 1234’s all-in-one program.
echo V1.6 is coming soon, stay tuned!
pause
cls
goto lol
:lol
This section will close the file.[/code]
Push d to delete all your character files hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It’s probably just a file in your char files that can’t be deleted. I used to get those all the time. Don’t worry about them.

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @Full_Throttle Full Throttle
item.description:
@Full_Throttle wrote:

it’s not a text file… it looks like them .rar files

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Text files can’t contain viruses, and if they did, the program that opens text files would only read the source, not execute the program.

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:6, topic:273712”][quote author=Full Throttle link=topic=361704.msg2750064#msg2750064 date=1239846205]
What’s this gotta do with a virus in my folder? how do i delete it is what im asking
[/quote]Did you not read what he said? There is NO virus in your character files – they are only text files.

He’s saying there might be a line of code in your source giving any player named ‘Poop’ hidden co-owner/admin powers.[/quote]Watch he’s gonna go look up the name “poop” in his files and come back and say “No!”

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Full Throttle, post:5, topic:273712”]What’s this gotta do with a virus in my folder? how do i delete it is what im asking[/quote]Did you not read what he said? There is NO virus in your character files – they are only text files.

He’s saying there might be a line of code in your source giving any player named ‘Poop’ hidden co-owner/admin powers.

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @Full_Throttle Full Throttle
item.description:
@Full_Throttle wrote:

What’s this gotta do with a virus in my folder? how do i delete it is what im asking

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Maybe you leeched a source, and there was a line in the source that says - if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Poop")) { playerRights = 4; }
You never know…

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @Full_Throttle Full Throttle
item.description:
@Full_Throttle wrote:

no seriously there is!,because i had people hacking my co owners… but how do i delete the file i can’t do anything to it delete it move it or even rename it!

Read full topic

item.title: Virus in my character files!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

There can’t be a virus in your character file…Even if there was, how would it be activated? It’s only text.

Read full topic
